problem_text_cn: 如图,在边长为1的正方形网格中,连接格点D、N和E、C,DN和EC相交于点P,tan∠CPN为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in a square grid with edge length N_0. Connect grid points D, N and E, C, DN and EC intersect at point P, then tan∠CPN is ()
raw_answer: 解:连接格点MN、DM,如图所示:则四边形MNCE是平行四边形,△DAM和△MBN都是等腰直角三角形,∴EC∥MN,∠DMA=∠NMB=45°,DM=√{2}AD=2√{2},MN=√{2}BM=√{2},∴∠CPN=∠DNM,∴tan∠CPN=tan∠DNM,∵∠DMN=180°-∠DMA-∠NMB=180°-45°-45°=90°,∴tan∠CPN=tan∠DNM=\frac{DM}{MN}=\frac{2√{2}}{√{2}}=2,故选:B．\lbrack\frac{D}{M}\rbrack:\frac{c}{\omega}≥q\rbrace
